00027 void CTracker_harris::Match(IplImage *f)
00028 {
00029    IplImage *grey;
00030    grey=cvCreateImage( cvGetSize(f), 8, 1 );
00031    CvPoint temp;
00032    cvCvtColor(f,grey,CV_RGB2GRAY);
00033         
00034    IplImage *patron,*patron_border;
00035    patron = cvCreateImageHeader( cvSize(10,10),8,1);
00036    patron_border = cvCreateImage( cvSize(10,10),8,1);
00037         
00038    for ( list<CElempunto*>::iterator It=pMap->bbdd.begin();
00039          It != pMap->bbdd.end(); It++ )
00040    {
00041         if((*It)->state!=st_empty){
00042         patron->imageData=(char*)(*It)->key;
00043                         
00044         cvGetRectSubPix( grey, zonabusca,cvPointTo32f((*It)->pto) );
00045         //cvMatchTemplate( zonabusca, (*It)->patron,corr, CV_TM_CCORR_NORMED );
00046         cvMatchTemplate( zonabusca, patron,corr, CV_TM_CCORR_NORMED );
00047         cvMinMaxLoc( corr, &minVal, &maxVal, &minLoc, &maxLoc, 0 );
00048         //(*It)->maxVal=maxVal;//FIXME Usar como indicador de calidad
00049         temp.x=maxLoc.x+(*It)->pto.x-(cvGetSize(corr).width/2);
00050         temp.y=maxLoc.y+(*It)->pto.y-(cvGetSize(corr).height/2);
00051 
00052         cvSobel(zonabusca,zonabusca,1,1,3);
00053         cvSobel(patron,patron_border,1,1,3);
00054 
00055         cvMatchTemplate( zonabusca, patron_border,corr, CV_TM_CCORR_NORMED );
00056         cvMinMaxLoc( corr, &minVal, &maxVal, &minLoc, &maxLoc, 0 );
00057                 
00058         double dx=temp.x-(maxLoc.x+(*It)->pto.x-cvGetSize(corr).width/2);
00059         double dy=temp.y-(maxLoc.y+(*It)->pto.y-cvGetSize(corr).height/2);
00060         cout<<"dx: "<<dx <<" dy: "<<dy<<endl;
00061         cout<<dx<<" "<<temp.x<<" "<<maxLoc.x+(*It)->pto.x-cvGetSize(corr).width/2<<" "<<(*It)->pto.x<<endl;
00062         cout<<dy<<" "<<temp.y<<" "<<maxLoc.y+(*It)->pto.y-cvGetSize(corr).height/2<<" "<<(*It)->pto.y<<endl;
00063 
00064 //      if((*It)->maxVal<0.5)
00065         if (sqrt(dx*dx+dy*dy)>40||temp.x<0 ||temp.y<0)
00066         {
00067         //      cout<<"no match "<<sqrt(dx*dx+dy*dy)<<" "<<(*It)->maxVal<<" "<<maxVal<<endl;
00068                 if((*It)->state==st_inited)
00069                 {
00070                         std::cout << "borropuntos: "<<(*It)->pto.x<<" "<<(*It)->pto.y<<std::endl;
00071                         (*It)->state = st_no_view;
00072                         pMap->visible--;
00073                 }else if((*It)->state!=st_no_view)
00074                 {
00075                         cout<< "borro punto por no iniciado y fuera devista " << endl;
00076 //                      pMap->bbdd.erase(It);
00077 //                      (*It)->state = st_empty;
00078 //                      pMap->visible--;
00079                 }
00081         }
00082         else
00083         {
00084         //      cout<<"si match "<<sqrt(dx*dx+dy*dy)<<" "<<(*It)->maxVal<<" "<<maxVal<<endl;
00085                 (*It)->old_pto.x=(*It)->pto.x;
00086                 (*It)->old_pto.y=(*It)->pto.y;
00087                 (*It)->pto.x=temp.x;
00088                 (*It)->pto.y=temp.y;
00089                 if((*It)->state==st_no_view)
00090                 {
00091                         (*It)->state=st_inited;
00092                 }
00093         }        
00094       } //if !empty    
00095    }//end for
00096    cvReleaseImage(&grey);
00097    cvReleaseImage(&patron_border);

00100 void CTracker_harris::Init(IplImage *f,CvMat **keys,CvMat **points)
00101 {
00102    int cornercount;
00103    cornercount=30;
00104    //cvCvtColor(f,grey,CV_RGB2GRAY);
00105    CvPoint2D32f corners[100];
00106    IplImage *grey, *eig_image, *temp, *patron;
00107    grey=cvCreateImage( cvGetSize(f), 8, 1 );   
00108    patron=cvCreateImage( cvSize(10,10), 8, 1 );   
00109    eig_image = cvCreateImage( cvGetSize(f), 32, 1 );
00110    temp=cvCreateImage(cvGetSize(f),32,1);
00111    cvCvtColor(f,grey,CV_RGB2GRAY);
00112    
00113    CvPoint pts[30];
00114         
00115    cvGoodFeaturesToTrack(grey,eig_image,temp,corners,&cornercount,0.1, 40, NULL);
00116         
00117     *keys = cvCreateMat(cornercount,128,CV_32FC1) ;
00118     *points = cvCreateMat(cornercount,4,CV_32FC1) ;
00119         cout<<"esquinas encontradas"<<cornercount<<endl;
00120    for (int i=0;i<cornercount;i++){
00121       pts[i]=cvPointFrom32f( corners[i]);
00122           cvGetRectSubPix( grey, patron,corners[i] );//  
00123           for (int j=0;j<100;j++)
00124           {
00125                   cvmSet(*keys,i,j,*(patron->imageData+j));
00126           }
00127           cvmSet(*points,i,0,pts[i].x);
00128           cvmSet(*points,i,1,pts[i].y);
00129           cvmSet(*points,i,2,10);
00130           cvmSet(*points,i,3,0);
00131    }
00132    
00133    cvReleaseImage(&grey);
00134    cvReleaseImage(&eig_image);
00135    cvReleaseImage(&temp);
00136         
00137 }

00148    for (int i = 0 ; i<10; i++)
00149         for ( int j = 0; j<10; j++)
00150         {
00151                 a= cvGet2D( patron, i , j);
00152                 key[i*10+j]= a.val[0];
